amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to ensure veterans can participate in state-approved medical marijuana programs. The amendment removes the current directive that prevents VA Medical Facility staff from recommending, making referrals, or completing forms and registering Veterans for participation in state-approved marijuana programs.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allows veterans to participate in state-approved medical marijuana programs and removes the current directive that prevents the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Facility staff from recommending, making referrals, or completing forms and registering Veterans for participation in state-approved marijuana programs.
